name: Construct - Summoner Battle Game
description:
I'm trying the Game a Month Challenge and this is my first game. I started development on May 1st and ended on May 31st. So this is more of a prototype of a game and I'd love to hear your feedback!

In Construct, you choose a summoner and summon creatures called Constructs. The constructs move across the battlefield and attack any other constructs in the way. The goal is to defeat the other summoner.

This game was created with Unity 3D. I created all the assets using Blender and Photoshop.

If you're interested in the development, I have a devlog here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCLEe2RvjKQXDlJsNfEjW_A/
